__e: And I know, it's crazy and irrational, but, Sam, I can't help thinking that last night, when her time came, she must have wondered where I was.
I can't help but think... if only we'd arrived at the truth sooner, we might have been able to save her life.
When I saw that, I could not stop thinking: "I can do that too!"
You know, I couldn't help but notice when we were beating the crap out of each other that you have a simple yet perfect form yourself.
You know, Lieutenant, I can't help but notice that I'm doing most of the talking here, which is fine.
I couldn't help but notice that you are very much in love with this lady. And I have a sketch for you.
That can keep me awake the rest of my life.
I can't help but think... if only we'd arrived at the truth sooner, we might have been able to save her life.
Annie, I know I'm not your idea of something romantic, but I can't help it if I love you, if that counts for anything.
It's no concern of mine, but I overheard you when you discussed it.
You know, I couldn't help but overhear what Jeff was saying about... some lucky guy your own age and I just thought since I am 14...
Do you think something's happened to him.
I'm happy, I can't help it.
You must have gone through hell but I can't help being jealous.
No one can stop me from agreeing with you if I want.
